description:
The same form-fitting comfort you are used to, but now made using US-grown cotton. Blending cotton and luxuriously soft Tencel Modal, these boxer briefs breathe well and feel fantastic. Using MyPakage technology, the 3-D pouch cradles you from every angle, and a pucker panel eliminates seams in sensitive areas to prevent chafing or discomfort.

  • Gentle cotton and Tencel Modal blend with just enough spandex for a comfortable stretch
  • MyPakage technology 3-dimensional pouch provides excellent support
  • Premium waistband is sewn directly to the body for long-lasting durability
  • 5.5in. inseam
name: BN3TH Outset Boxer Brief 2 Pack - Men's
